slides.title: Tipsy Beans Café
slides.description: Cozy brunch spot known for strong coffee, creative cocktails, and a laid‑back atmosphere.

slides.title: Residents Cafe & Bar
slides.description: Hip spot featuring a global menu with brunch classics, burgers & meat plates, plus wine & cocktails.

slides.title: Dupont Underground
slides.description: An abandoned trolley station transformed into an arts venue beneath Dupont Circle.

slides.title: Regal Gallery Place
slides.description: Theater complex with multiple screens featuring new release films, plush seating & concession stand.

slides.title: Jaleo
slides.description: Buzzy Spanish spot from chef José Andrés serving tapas, paella & sangria in a striking, artsy space.

slides.title: Unconventional Diner
slides.description: Industrial‑chic bistro and bar for upscale comfort fare, coffee, beer, wine, and cocktails.

slides.title: L’Ardente
slides.description: Elegant Italian restaurant with chandeliers and a gold‑plated pizza oven firing signature pies.

slides.title: Laos in Town
slides.description: A menu featuring classic dishes from Laos in an elevated dining room with a marble counter bar.

slides.title: YELLOW Union Market
slides.description: Trendy cafe offering pastries and Mediterranean flavors in a modern, stylish space inside Union Market.

slides.title: The Wren at The Watermark Hotel
slides.description: Modern restaurant inside The Watermark Hotel offering refined American‑Japanese fusion cuisine.

slides.title: Renee's Crêpes & Cakes
slides.description: Sweet or savory crepes and house‑made cakes in a cozy setting.

slides.title: Shyndigz
slides.description: Vibrant dessert specialist featuring a rotating menu of elaborate cakes & pies made from scratch.
